code: import React from'react';import JournalEntry from'./JournalEntry';import LoadingSpinner from'../common/LoadingSpinner';import ErrorMessage from'../common/ErrorMessage';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EntryList=_ref=>{let{entries,loading,error,onEdit,onDelete,onRetry}=_ref;if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoadingSpinner,{message:"Loading your entries..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorMessage,{error:error,onRetry:onRetry,type:"error"});}if(entries.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"empty-state",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"empty-state-icon",children:"\uD83D\uDCDD"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"No journal entries yet"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Start writing your first entry to track your mood and thoughts!"})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"entry-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"entry-list-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Journal Entries"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"entry-count",children:[entries.length," ",entries.length===1?'entry':'entries']})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"entry-list-content",children:entries.map(entry=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(JournalEntry,{entry:entry,onEdit:onEdit,onDelete:onDelete},entry.id))})]});};export default EntryList;
